data.title: Asa Buchanan Archives
data.meta_description: Asa Buchanan is a self-made millionaire, the owner of many diversified holdings through Buchanan Enterprises. He married his first wife, Olympia, at an early age and she bore him two sons, Clint and Bo. Of course, Asa would be married many more times after this… Wife: Renee Buchanan Children: Clint Buchanan (with Olympia Buchanan), Bo Buchanan (with Olympia Buchanan), Ben Davidson (deceased; with Renee Buchanan) Grandchildren: Natalie BuchananJessica Buchanan (adoptive), Kevin Buchanan (adoptive), Joey Buchanan (adoptive), Cord Roberts, Drew Buchanan (deceased), Matthew Rappaport Great Grandchildren: Sarah “Flash” Roberts, CJ Roberts, Megan Buchanan (deceased), Duke Buchanan (adoptive; deceased), Brennan Buchanan (adoptive) Great Great Grandchildren: Zane Buchanan (adoptive) Siblings: Pike Buchanan Nephews: Austin Buchanan (deceased), Rafe Garretson Significant Romantic Relationships: Olympia Buchanan (1st wife/divorced), Mimi King, Samantha Vernon (2nd wife/divorced), Delila Ralston (3rd wife/divorced), Becky Lee Abbott (4th wife/divorced), Pamela Stuart (5th wife/divorced), Renee Buchanan (6th,10th and 13th wife), Blair Cramer (7th wife/divorced), Alex Olanov (8th and 9th wife/divorced), Gabrielle Medina (11th wife/divorced), Rae Cummings (12th wife/divorced)
data.text:
Asa Buchanan is a self-made millionaire, the owner of many diversified holdings through Buchanan Enterprises. He married his first wife, Olympia, at an early age and she bore him two sons, Clint and Bo. Of course, Asa would be married many more times after this…

Wife: Renee Buchanan

Children: Clint Buchanan (with Olympia Buchanan), Bo Buchanan (with Olympia Buchanan), Ben Davidson (deceased; with Renee Buchanan)

Grandchildren: Natalie BuchananJessica Buchanan (adoptive), Kevin Buchanan (adoptive), Joey Buchanan (adoptive), Cord Roberts, Drew Buchanan (deceased), Matthew Rappaport

Great Grandchildren: Sarah “Flash” Roberts, CJ Roberts, Megan Buchanan (deceased), Duke Buchanan (adoptive; deceased), Brennan Buchanan (adoptive)

Great Great Grandchildren: Zane Buchanan (adoptive)

Siblings: Pike Buchanan

Nephews: Austin Buchanan (deceased), Rafe Garretson

Significant Romantic Relationships: Olympia Buchanan (1st wife/divorced), Mimi King, Samantha Vernon (2nd wife/divorced), Delila Ralston (3rd wife/divorced), Becky Lee Abbott (4th wife/divorced), Pamela Stuart (5th wife/divorced), Renee Buchanan (6th,10th and 13th wife), Blair Cramer (7th wife/divorced), Alex Olanov (8th and 9th wife/divorced), Gabrielle Medina (11th wife/divorced), Rae Cummings (12th wife/divorced)
